text: Pseudancita is a genus of longhorn beetles of the subfamily Lamiinae,Biolib.cz - Pseudancita. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. containing the following species: * Pseudancita alboplagiata (Aurivillius, 1927) * Pseudancita curvifasciata (Aurivillius, 1927) ==References== Category:Desmiphorini
title: Pseudancita
